short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support for TeraBox screenshot, upload, and other capabilities

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily save any files from any webpages to TeraBox!

TeraBox Download Assistant can detect download requests from a webpage, and save any files you want to your personal TeraBox account. You can also use this extension to capture and save screenshots. All files will be safely stored in TeraBox for you to easily check on any time and anywhere!

More efficiency-enhancing features for our users and webmasters are under development. Please stay tuned!
long.zh_CN:
TeraBox Download Assistant

This extension is used to implement TeraBox to take over the download requests from Chrome browser and save the files from the downloaded web pages to TeraBox for backup.

【Attention】
The official TeraBox client needs to be installed.
Only support Windows system.
